CustomField.description: This formula field is used to calculate the UTC time that can be used to create a Google Calendar link that correctly creates the event in the user's time zone.
CustomField.formula: DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT( Start_Date__c ) + " " + LEFT(TEXT(Training_Event_Start_Time__c),8)) + CASE(TEXT(Training_Event_Time_Zone__c), "North America Pacific Standard Time", (8/24), "North America Central Standard Time", (6/24), "North America Mountain Standard Time", (7/24), "North America Eastern Standard Time", (5/24), "North America Pacific Daylight Time", (7/24), "North America Mountain Daylight Time", (6/24), "North America Central Daylight Time", (5/24), "North America Eastern Daylight Time", (4/24), "North America Atlantic Daylight Time", (3/24), "North America Newfoundland Daylight Time", (2.5/24), "Normale de l'Est", (4/24), "Avane√® de l'est", (5/24), "North America Atlantic Standard Time", (4/24), "North America Newfoundland Standard Time", (3.5/24), "Norfolk Island Standard Time", (-11/24), "Australian Western Standard Time", (-8/24), "Australian Western Daylight Time", (-9/24), "Australian Central Standard Time", (-9.5/24), "Australian Central Daylight Time", (-10.5/24), "Australian Eastern Standard Time", (-10/24), "Australian Eastern Daylight Time", (-12/24), "New Zealand Standard Time", (-12/24), "New Zealand Daylight Time", (-13/24), "Christmas Island Time", (-7/24), 0)
CustomField.label: start D/T
